7HD.F.summary: NEUCA S.A. engages in the distribution of pharmaceuticals to pharmacies and hospitals in Poland. It operates through Pharmaceutical Wholesale; Own Brands; and Outpatient Care Clinics, Clinical Trials and Telemedicine segments. The company also provides logistic and distribution services, such as national and international transport; warehousing; lease space for pharmaceutical wholesalers; import and custom; product packaging and repackaging; call center; intervention channel; and tailored services. In addition, it is involved of provision advertising and marketing services; pharmaceutical products under its own brand; and operation of outpatient care clinics, as well as provision of clinical trials and telemedicine. The company was formerly known as Torfarm SA and changed its name to NEUCA S.A. in April 2010. NEUCA S.A. was founded in 1990 and is based in Torun, Poland.
